item.description:
DUDECK Alleys ON CHILD ST, WARREN...take Rt 195E to exit 2, South on 136, in the curve section, take a left at the light where 103 crosses 136.  thru next light on block, go one block more and Dudek is on the right.  Parking on side and behind.... they have 3.50 per game, and 2.50 for shoe rental...can't beat that!!!   They have automatic scoring...nice seating, "food",  and it  looks like more fun.  perhaps we can grab a bunch of people and have a blast.... again. small balls are perfect for those of us who are older, or small in stature, or just plain spastic, like me.  next time we will go further north to accomidate Germaine, Jeannie and others further north...  then maybe west, or south or ?

 

and depending on the turnout, perhaps we will have a more regular gathering.
item.name: Bowling III- Duckpin at Dudeks
